agate.metaphysical: Balances ying-yang energy, stabilizes the aura.  Facilitates discernment. Imparts strength and courage.  Opens one to innate creative talents.  (There are many forms of agate, each with specific properties.)

amber.metaphysical: purifies body, mind, and spirit.  Balances electromagnetics of the body and allows even flow of energies.  provides a positive, soothing energy.  Spiritualizes the intellect.

amethyst.metaphysical: Sedative energy.  Facilitates spirituality and contentment.  Stone of stability, strength, and peace.  Excellent for meditation. Enhances psychic ability.

aventurine.metaphysical: Independence, leadership, creativity.  Balances male/female energies.  Aligns mental, physical, emotional, and auric bodies.

aquamarine.metaphysical: Courage, intellect, protection.  Assists spiritual awareness, actualization.

azurite.metaphysical: Awakens psychic ability, insight, intuition.  Third eye.  Excellent for clearing the mind in meditation.

calcite.metaphysical: Energy amplifier, teacher. Optical Calcite is excellent for clearing and cleansing.

celestite.metaphysical: Excellent stone for dream recall and astral travel.  Hope and harmony.  Communication.

chrysocolla.metaphysical: Strength, balance.  promotes harmony and attunement to the earth.  purifies one's environment.

chrysoprase.metaphysical: Balances yin-yang energy.  Acceptance of self and others.

citrine.metaphysical: positive energy - stone needs no cleansing .  Dissipates negative energy.  Warmth, joy, optimism.

copal.metaphysical: Excellent for strengthening the abilities of the mind, and altered states of consciousness.  Amplifies one's energy field.

danburite.metaphysical: powerful intellectual activator. Aids with communication and relationships with others. Helps remove toxins from the body.

emerald.metaphysical: Loyalty, sensitivity, harmony, tranquility.  Assists in memory retention and mental clarity.

epidote.metaphysical: Enhances perception and personal power. Excellent for attunement in all aspects of awareness, improvement, abundance, and healing.

fairy stone.metaphysical: Good luck, protection against evil spirits, and brings health and prosperity to the home.

fire agate.metaphysical: Spiritual flame, perfection. protects and dispels fears. progression, advancement, inspiration.

fluorite.metaphysical: Stability, order, discernment, concentration. Helps one to understand and maintain ideals and the perfection of the universe.

fuchsite.metaphysical: Aids in the assessment of personal issues, enhances knowledge and decision making.

garnet.metaphysical: Commitment, devotion, love, stability and order.  Even flow of energy.

herkimer diamond.metaphysical: Awareness, attunement, clairvoyance, telepathy. Good for information retention.

howlite.metaphysical: Memory, knowledge, and progress. Encourages reasoning, observation, discernment, patience, and tact. Can eliminate pain, stress, and anger.

kunzite.metaphysical: Communication, love, peace.  protects and dissolves negativity.  Excellent for meditation.

kyanite.metaphysical: Never needs cleaning or clearing, aligns all chakras.  Tranquility, communication, psychic awareness. Excellent for meditation and dream recall.

labradorite.metaphysical: Represents the light of the universe, extra-terrestrial energy.  Intuition, subconscious.  Illumination.

lapis lazuli.metaphysical: Knowledge, wisdom, perfection, protection, creative expression.

lepidolite.metaphysical: Honesty, stability, hope, acceptance. Assists in change and transition. Facilitates astral travel.

lingam stone.metaphysical: Stone of the Kundalini. Awakens the major energy centers of the chakras, from the base to crown. Balances male (yang) energy.

malachite.metaphysical: Transformation, spiritual development. Clears the way to attain goals. Fidelity, loyalty, reasoning ability.

moonstone.metaphysical: Lunar, female energy.  Emotional, intuitive. Rhythms, cycles, destiny.

obsidian.metaphysical: Dispels negativity. Grounding, healing, protective.  Helps one to clearly see one's flaws and the changes that are necessary.

onyx.metaphysical: Centering, self-control, intuitive guidance.  Assists in the grieving process.

peridot.metaphysical: Healing, protective. Allows one to understand changes in one's life, regulates life cycles.

petrified wood.metaphysical: Grounding, provides strength. Stone of transformation.

prehnite.metaphysical: Stone for dreaming and remembering. Facilitates contact with non-physical entities and extraterrestrials. Good for use in grid work. Inspiration and prophecy.

pyrite.metaphysical: Shields from negative energy, good stone of protection. Enhances intellect and memory. Symbol of the sun.

rhodochrosite.metaphysical: Love energy. Excellent stone for balance in all areas.

rutilated quartz.metaphysical: Intensifies energy of the crystal. Stimulates brain. Inspiration, clairvoyance.

selenite.metaphysical: Clarity of consciousness, awareness, insight, good judgement. Aids in accessing past/future lives.

silver.metaphysical: Mirror to the soul. Eloquence. Connects physical and astral bodies. In jewelry, it provides a balanced setting that retains the qualities of the stone it holds. Lunar energy. Cleansing, balancing.

smoky quartz.metaphysical: Dissolves negativity, grounding, balancing. Excellent for meditation.

sodalite.metaphysical: Logic, efficiency, truthfulness. Enhances group communication.

staurolite.metaphysical: Known as a talisman of good luck. Aids relief of stress and depression. provides connection and balance between the physical, astral, and extra-terrestrial planes.

stromatolite.metaphysical: These stones hold the energy of the most ancient life on earth. promotes perseverance, strength, stability, connection to life.

tanzanite.metaphysical: protection, safety. perfect symmetry of personal power and actualization. Brings together all aspects of communication and psychic power. Can be used to stimulate visions of higher spiritual realms.

tigereye.metaphysical: Earthy, grounding. Represents sun and earth. Optimism, insight, personal power.

topaz.metaphysical: Success, true love, individuality, creativity, joy.

tourmalinated quartz.metaphysical: Strength, balancing. Combines attributes of tourmaline and quartz.

vanadinite.metaphysical: Facilitates mental processes, allows for a deep state of meditation. promotes thrift in spending and order to one's life.
